Text: 2003 Kids' Choice Awards:  It was the 16th annual Kids' Choice Awards ("KCA").
Triplets:<2003 Kids' Choice Awards
2:
--------------------
Text: 2003 Kids' Choice Awards:  It was hosted by Rosie O'Donnell.
Triplets:<2003 Kids' Choice Awards
4:
--------------------
<Text: 2003 Kids' Choice Awards: This was the last time O'Donnell would host the awards.>

Triplets:<2003 Kids' Choice Awards
5:
--------------------
Text: 2003 Kids' Choice Awards:  By that time she has hosted the awards seven times in a row.
Triplets:<2003 Kids' Choice Awards
6:
--------------------
Text: 2003 Kids' Choice Awards: The announcers were Daran Norris and Susanne Blakeslee from "The Fairly OddParents" who used their Cosmo and Wanda voices, respectively, for the event.

Triplets:<2003 Kids' Choice Awards
